scripts.docs:build: npm run docs:prepare && rm -rf _book && gitbook build
scripts.docs:publish: npm run docs:build && cd _book && git init && echo 'base.md' > .gitignore && git commit --allow-empty -m 'update docs' && git checkout -b gh-pages && git add --all && git commit -am 'update docs' && git push https://github.com/eeemarv/letsystem-design-manual gh-pages --force
